Room.description: the control room is alive with blinking lights and monitors that cover every wall, desks with little knickknacks are laid in a orderd fashion.

RoomObjects.name: Security_guard_corpse
RoomObjects.description: the security guard, said to keep us safe and yet he is in his own pool of blood

RoomObjects.name: Central_computer
RoomObjects.description: the central computer is finally back online.

RoomObjects.name: Cafeteria_emergancy_door
RoomObjects.description: the door has been lifted and is no longer in the way
